meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Cake</kanji> is a <kanji>child</kanji>'s favorite <vocabulary>snack food</vocabulary>. This word refers to all the junky snacks you can imagine, <vocabulary>candy</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>pastries</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>sweets</vocabulary>, but also savory snacks too. You know, like chips and stuff... 🤤
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
